com.camerontec.catalys.util.fast

Interface ITemplateSelector

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConstantMessageTypeTemplateSelector, ScpTemplateSelector, TemplateTagSelector

    public interface ITemplateSelector
extends Serializable
    Interface for classes which contain the logic for selecting which template should be used to encode a given message.

    The FAST specification does not specify how template selection occurs. See http://fixprotocol.org/discuss/read/44da8596

    For example, when encoding FIX messages an implementation of this class would probably select a template based on the value of the FIX MsgType field in a message.

    Quoting from the posting mentioned above:

    "The template selection rules cannot be expressed in the template syntax but is a feature of a particular encoder implementation. Interoperability is not a problem here as long as you have your typeRefs in order. Provided that a decoder does not make any assumptions about a particular template name or id (it shouldn't), but always use the typeRef when communicating with the application it does not matter which template the encoder selects."

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getTemplateID(IFastEncodableMessage message)
      Returns template identifier to be used for encoding the given message.

    • Method Detail

      • getTemplateID

        int getTemplateID(IFastEncodableMessage message)
           throws TemplateException
        Returns template identifier to be used for encoding the given message.
        Parameters:
        message - Message for which we want to find an encoding template.
        Returns:
        int Template identifier
        Throws:
        TemplateException - if no appropriate template is found.

      • getTemplateID

        int getTemplateID(IValue value)
           throws TemplateException
        Returns template identifier associated with the given value. Often templates are selected based on the value of a particular field in a message - typically the message type field.
        Parameters:
        value - Value for which we want to find an encoding template.
        Returns:
        int Template identifier
        Throws:
        TemplateException - if no appropriate template is found.

      • setTemplates

        void setTemplates(ITemplates templates)
           throws TemplateException
        Defines templates which are available for selection.

        This method will be called following instantiation of this object.

        Parameters:
        templates - Templates that we select from.
        Throws:
        TemplateException - if the templates are unsuitable for this selection logic.
